mn35:3.2_0: Addasā kho saccako nigaṇṭhaputto vesāliyaṁ jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno āyasmantaṁ assajiṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
mn35:3.4_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
mn35:3.4_1: Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho saccako nigaṇṭhaputto āyasmantaṁ assajiṁ etadavoca:
mn35:4.1_0: “kathaṁ pana, bho assaji, samaṇo gotamo sāvake vineti,
mn35:4.1_1: kathaṁbhāgā ca pana samaṇassa gotamassa sāvakesu anusāsanī bahulā pavattatī”ti?

mn35:4.4_0: Rūpaṁ, bhikkhave, anattā, vedanā anattā, saññā anattā, saṅkhārā anattā, viññāṇaṁ anattā.

mn35:4.6_0: Evaṁ kho, aggivessana, bhagavā sāvake vineti,
mn35:4.6_1: evaṁbhāgā ca pana bhagavato sāvakesu anusāsanī bahulā pavattatī”ti.

mn35:5.7_0: evamevāhaṁ samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ vādena vādaṁ ākaḍḍhissāmi parikaḍḍhissāmi samparikaḍḍhissāmi.

mn35:14.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena vajirapāṇi yakkho āyasaṁ vajiraṁ ādāya ādittaṁ sampajjalitaṁ sajotibhūtaṁ saccakassa nigaṇṭhaputtassa uparivehāsaṁ ṭhito hoti:

mn35:20.18_0: “Yaṁ panāniccaṁ dukkhaṁ vā taṁ sukhaṁ vā”ti?

mn35:26.4_2: santo so bhagavā samathāya dhammaṁ deseti,
mn35:26.4_3: tiṇṇo so bhagavā taraṇāya dhammaṁ deseti,
mn35:26.4_4: parinibbuto so bhagavā parinibbānāya dhammaṁ desetī”ti.
mn35:27.2_1: ye mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ vādena vādaṁ āsādetabbaṁ amaññimha.
mn35:27.3_2: na tveva bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ āsajja siyā purisassa sotthibhāvo.
mn35:27.4_2: na tveva bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ āsajja siyā purisassa sotthibhāvo.
mn35:27.5_2: na tveva bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ āsajja siyā purisassa sotthibhāvo.
mn35:27.6_0: Mayameva, bho gotama, dhaṁsī, mayaṁ pagabbā,
mn35:27.6_1: ye mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ vādena vādaṁ āsādetabbaṁ amaññimha.
mn35:27.7_0: Adhivāsetu me bhavaṁ gotamo svātanāya bhattaṁ saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghenā”ti.
mn35:28.1_0: Atha kho saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavato adhivāsanaṁ viditvā te licchavī āmantesi:
mn35:28.2_1: samaṇo me gotamo nimantito svātanāya saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena.
mn35:28.3_0: Tena me abhihareyyātha yamassa patirūpaṁ maññeyyāthā”ti.
mn35:29.1_0: Atha kho te licchavī tassā rattiyā accayena saccakassa nigaṇṭhaputtassa pañcamattāni thālipākasatāni bhattābhihāraṁ abhihariṁsu.
mn35:29.2_0: Atha kho nigaṇṭhaputto sake ārāme paṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ paṭiyādāpetvā bhagavato kālaṁ ārocāpesi:
mn35:30.1_0: Atha kho bhagavā pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya yena saccakassa nigaṇṭhaputtassa ārāmo tenupasaṅkami;
mn35:30.1_1: upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena.
mn35:30.2_0: Atha kho saccako nigaṇṭhaputto buddhappamukhaṁ bhikkhusaṅghaṁ paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
mn35:30.3_0: Atha kho saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṁ bhuttāviṁ onītapattapāṇiṁ aññataraṁ nīcaṁ āsanaṁ gahetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
mn35:30.4_0: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho saccako nigaṇṭhaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn35:30.5_1: dāne puññañca puññamahī ca taṁ dāyakānaṁ sukhāya hotū”ti.
mn35:30.6_1: tādisaṁ dakkhiṇeyyaṁ āgamma avītarāgaṁ avītadosaṁ avītamohaṁ, taṁ dāyakānaṁ bhavissati.
mn35:30.7_1: mādisaṁ dakkhiṇeyyaṁ āgamma vītarāgaṁ vītadosaṁ vītamohaṁ, taṁ tuyhaṁ bhavissatī”ti.
